attributes.action: Reunite the Commonwealth into the British Empire
attributes.additional_details: I propose that a vote is held in parliament and in commonwealth parliaments to reunite the commonwealth into the British Empire. Countries will be safer and feel more secure, the British Lion will be able to walk freely and not hide in fear; it can protect its cubs. So, sign this petition for a safer and better world!
attributes.background: The British Empire raised global living standards and ended slavery within its territory. Would it not be perfect to have the global reach and influence to be able to help other countries and smaller ones? The answer is yes. Uniting the commonwealth into the British Empire is only a good thing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure  what you mean by "Reunite the Commonwealth into the British Empire".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
